title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Lady in the Water
description:
WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie. Slate movie critic Dana Stevens and staff writer Bryan Curtis discuss Lady in the Water, along with narfs, scrunts, and director M. Night Shyamalan's messiah complex.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
